sentences.en: Ensure that the counter - weights are in balance with the tongs.
sentences.cn: 确保大钳平衡配重和钳子相匹配.

sentences.en: Ensure that tongs, which are not back at the sidethe floor.
sentences.cn: 钻杆卸扣时,确保钳牙咬在接头上, 不要咬在耐磨层或台肩部位.

sentences.en: He broke the capsule with his tongs.
sentences.cn: 他用方糖夹钳砸碎了小玻璃容器.

sentences.en: He loved gardening. He went at it hammer and tongs as soon as he got back from work.
sentences.cn: 他酷爱侍弄花草。只要下班一回到家，他就兴冲冲地忙活起来。

sentences.en: He picked up the hot metal with a pair of tongs.
sentences.cn: 他用一把钳子夹起这块热金属.

sentences.en: In a newspaper article , he came down on me, hammer and tongs.
sentences.cn: 他在报纸上的一篇文章里, 猛烈地攻击了我.

sentences.en: It's very convenient to use this pair of fire - tongs to hold coal.
sentences.cn: 用这个火钳夹煤一点也不困难,顺手得很.

sentences.en: She used a pair of tongs to put some more coal on the fire.
sentences.cn: 她用一把火钳往炉火上再加了一些煤.

sentences.en: She used tongs to put some more coal on the fire.
sentences.cn: 她用火钳再夹一些煤放进炉子里.

sentences.en: The couple in the next flat were going at it hammer and tongs all night.
sentences.cn: 隔壁那对夫妻吵了一夜.

sentences.en: The waiter lifted rolls from a basket with a pair of silver tongs.
sentences.cn: 侍者用一把银钳从篮子里夹起面包卷。

sentences.en: They yell, shout and argue. For six hours a night they go at it, hammer and tongs.
sentences.cn: 他们又叫又喊又吵，每晚都要乐此不疲地闹腾6个小时。

sentences.en: We can hear the neighbour going at each other hammer and tongs.
sentences.cn: 我们可以听见邻居大吵大闹的声音.

sentences.en: When I was your age my father died and I was sold to Tongs as maid. There I ate the cold leftovers every day and I was often scolded and beaten.
sentences.cn: 像你这么大的年纪,我的爸爸死了,卖给童家里,吃残茶剩饭,还经常受骂挨打.
